exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language codeF : Functions L -> nat codeR : Relations L -> nat Formula := fol.Formula L : Set Formulas := fol.Formulas L : Set System := fol.System L : Type Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L orH := fol.orH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L andH := fol.andH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L existH := fol.existH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L iffH := fol.iffH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L ifThenElseH := fol.ifThenElseH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L t : Term Unable to unify "codeList (freeVarTerm L t)" with "codeFreeVarTerm (codeTerm L codeF t)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
codeF: Functions L -> nat
codeR: Relations L -> nat
Formula: Set
Formulas: Set
System: Type
Term: Set
Terms: nat -> Set
var: nat -> fol.Term L
apply: forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L
equal: fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L
atomic: forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L
impH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
notH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
forallH: nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
orH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
andH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
existH: nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
iffH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
ifThenElseH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L

Goal:
forall t : Term, codeFreeVarTerm (codeTerm L codeF t) = codeList (freeVarTerm L t)

Premises:
codeFreeVarTerm = fun t : nat => cPairPi1 (codeFreeVarTermTerms t) : nat -> nat Arguments codeFreeVarTerm _%nat_scope
inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [L : Language codeF : Functions L -> nat codeR : Relations L -> nat Formula := fol.Formula L : Set Formulas := fol.Formulas L : Set System := fol.System L : Type Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L

substituteFormulaImpNice : forall (L : Language) (f g : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}), (forall q : nat * fol.Term L, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L g}, (forall q : nat * fol.Term L, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : nat * fol.Term L, substituteFormulaImp L f z1 g z3 q = substituteFormulaImp L f z2 g z4 q
substituteFormulaNot : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L), (nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L (fol.notH L f)}
Terms_Term_rec_full : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P0 n t
Terms_Term_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P0 n t
Term_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> SProp), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
fol.ifThenElseH : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
